## PublishingQueueExplorerTableExtensionsBuilder.contextMenu property

Provides a mechanism for customizing the configuration of actions within Publishing Queue Explorer Table context menu.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly contextMenu: ActionsConfigurationExtensionsBuilder;
```
